column1: Smoque BBQ////The popularity of this place has died down some over the years
column2: which is a good thing.  Used to be a line out the door at all times.  Now
column3: you walk right on in.  If you are planning to eat in tho
column4: they dont have many tables and if crowded
column5: you will sit with strangers - think Amtrak dining car.
